text: Simone Sherise Battle (June 17, 1989 - September 5, 2014) was an American actress and singer. She was a finalist on The X Factor in 2011. She was best known for being a member of the pop girl group G.R.L. from 2013 until her death. She worked with Robin Antin and The Pussycat Dolls. She also acted in the television series Everybody Hates Chris and Zoey 101. She also appeared in the movie We the Party (2012). Battle was born in Los Angeles, California. She was an actress before becoming a singer. Battle died on September 5, 2014 at her home in West Hollywood, California, aged 25. Her death was ruled a suicide by hanging. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1989 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Actors who committed suicide Category:African-American actors Category:African-American singers Category:American movie actors Category:American pop singers Category:American television actors Category:Musicians who committed suicide Category:Singers from Los Angeles Category:Suicides by hanging in the United States Category:Suicides in California
title: Simone Battle
